org.arl.fjage

Class MessageBehavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.arl.fjage.Behavior
      • org.arl.fjage.MessageBehavior
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Behavior>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ParameterMessageBehavior

    public class MessageBehavior
extends Behavior
    A behavior that continuously monitors the incoming message queue. The onReceive(Message) method of this behavior is called for every incoming message that matches the input filter defined for the behavior.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.arl.fjage.Behavior

        action, agent, log

      boolean done()

      int getPriority()

    • Method Detail

      • accepts

        public boolean accepts(Message msg)
        Check if this MessageBehavior accepts a specific message.
        Parameters:
        msg - message to check.
        Returns:
        true if it accepts, false otherwise.

      • onReceive

        public void onReceive(Message msg)
        This method is called for each message meeting the acceptance criteria of this behavior. A behavior must override this.
        Parameters:
        msg - received message.

      • action

        public final void action()
        This method calls onReceive(Message) for every message received that meets the acceptance criteria. The method causes the behavior to be blocked until appropriate message becomes available.
        Overrides:
        action in class Behavior
        See Also:
        Behavior.action()

      • done

        public final boolean done()
        This method always returns false, since this behavior never terminates.
        Overrides:
        done in class Behavior
        Returns:
        false.
        See Also:
        Behavior.done()

      • getPriority

        public int getPriority()
        Message behaviors with filters return a priority value of -100 to allow them to be executed before general message behaviors (no filters, priority value of 0).
        Overrides:
        getPriority in class Behavior
        Returns:
        priority value

      • create

        public static MessageBehavior create(java.util.function.Consumer<Message> consumer)
        Creates a new MessageBehavior which runs the specified Consumer on each incoming message.

        consumer - Consumer to run.
        Returns:
